text: people absolutely never recognize my
voice and I think a lot of it is because
it's out of context I am the original
voice of Siri what can I help you with
typically I speak up here in syria's
more down here everyone asks me how I
became the voice of Siri and my answer
is I don't know I know that I did some
recording for a text-to-speech company
starting back in 2005 I found out that I
was the voice of Siri on October 4th
2011 when Siri appeared here's the
forecast for today it is that easy a
fella voice actor emailed me and said
hey we've been playing around with this
new iPhone app isn't this you so I went
on the Apple site and listened and sure
enough it was me
my voice can actually be heard in a lot
of different places and I'm sure that
you hear it it probably at least once a
day so on a lot of different GPS systems
it's on Delta Airlines Gates worldwide
and I'm still doing a lot of voice work
and I do still do get requests to be the
robot voice but I'm also doing a lot of
speaking engagements and going around
talking about Syria and where she came
from and who she is all of the original
Siri voices worldwide and there were
many of us and some of the original
voices were male - we all didn't really
know what we were doing when we were
recording we did not know that we were
going to end up being on a telephone my
voice is no longer on the iPhone Siri
voices worldwide were changed
beginning with the OS 7 everyone wants
to know if I became a billionaire from
being Syria unfortunately not I will
have to say I'm a very fortunate person
and I have a fabulous life nothing but I
did not I do not get royalty checks for
Siri hello Siri are you real I'll leave
that for you to decide
she's going to leave that for me to
decide I've decided she's not
